mapper.select:
select
from members_info where mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and user_status ='00' and is_locked='0'
select count(0) from members_info a where a.user_status='00' and a.is_locked='0'

select a.ID 'id', a.register_time 'registerTime', a.mobile 'mobile', a.name 'name', a.sex 'sex', a.provice 'provice', a.city 'city', a.county 'county', a.last_login_time 'lastLoginTime' from members_info a where a.user_status='00' and a.is_locked='0'
limit #{pageNumber},#{pageSize}
